query:
SELECT 
  'clientes' as tabela,
  COUNT(*) as total,
  COUNT(CASE WHEN validationStatus IS NOT NULL THEN 1 END) as enriquecidos
FROM clientes
WHERE projectId = 1
UNION ALL
SELECT 
  'mercados_unicos' as tabela,
  COUNT(*) as total,
  NULL as enriquecidos
FROM mercados_unicos
WHERE projectId = 1
UNION ALL
SELECT 
  'produtos' as tabela,
  COUNT(*) as total,
  NULL as enriquecidos
FROM produtos
WHERE projectId = 1
UNION ALL
SELECT 
  'concorrentes' as tabela,
  COUNT(*) as total,
  NULL as enriquecidos
FROM concorrentes
WHERE projectId = 1
UNION ALL
SELECT 
  'leads' as tabela,
  COUNT(*) as total,
  NULL as enriquecidos
FROM leads
WHERE projectId = 1
UNION ALL
SELECT 
  'clientes_mercados' as tabela,
  COUNT(*) as total,
  NULL as enriquecidos
FROM clientes_mercados;
